T02D3205:211a-1: shukla t'a ra s'a dha nam /
T02D3205:211a-3: sgrol ma dkar mo'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3205:211a-4: de kho na bzhin du stong pa nyid bsgoms pa'i rjes thogs la /
T02D3205:211a-5: ra yongs su gyur pa'i nyi ma la gnas pa'i
T02D3205:211a-6: h'um las grub pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje yongs su
T02D3205:211a-7: gyur pa las / rdo rje'i rab la sogs pa
T02D3205:211a-8: rnam par bsams pa de'i dbus su yi ge pam
T02D3205:211a-9: las byung ba'i padma'i steng du yi ge pom las
T02D3205:211a-10: byung ba'i zla ba la yi ge h'um dkar po
T02D3205:211a-11: las skyes pa'i sa bon dang bcas pa'i autpala bltas
T02D3205:211a-12: gyur pa las / te / de nas spro ba
T02D3205:211a-13: la sogs sngon du btang ba'i de dag yongs su
T02D3205:211a-14: gyur pa las sgrol ma dkar mo zhal gsum phyag
T02D3205:211a-15: gyur pa las / te / drug ma / ser
T02D3205:211a-16: po dang mthing nag ni g-yas pa dang cig shos
T02D3205:211a-17: kyi zhal te zhal so so zhing spyan gsum gsum
T02D3205:211a-18: gyur pa las / te / drug ma / mo // mchog sbyin pa dang ;
T02D3205:211a-20: mda' bsnams pa ni g-yas kyi phyag gsum mo //
T02D3205:211a-23: gzhu bsnams pa ni g-yon gyi phyag gsum ste /
T02D3205:211a-24: zla ba'i gdan la skyil krung phyed pas bzhugs pa
T02D3205:211a-25: zla ba'i 'od dang ldan pa ral pa dang cod
T02D3205:211a-26: pan la don yod grub pa gnas pa /
T02D3205:211b-0: @211b dbu la mgo bo lngas rnam par brgyan cing /
T02D3205:211b-1: zla ba phyed pas spyi bor brgyan pa /
T02D3205:211b-2: sna tshogs pa'i rgyan mnga' ba /
T02D3205:211b-3: lo brgyad phrag gnyis kyi tshad /
T02D3205:211b-4: dur khrod brgyad kyi dbus na gnas pa dang rang
T02D3205:211b-5: bzhin gyi sa bon snying ga'i zla ba la gnas
T02D3205:211b-6: pa'i bdag nyid du yang rnam par bsams la sngags
T02D3205:211b-8: aom tsa le aa ni mitta ts'a le h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
T02D3205:211b-9: bsnyen gnas kyi mchod pa sngon du btang la thun
T02D3205:211b-10: bzhir zla ba gcig bzlas pas zhi ba la sogs
T02D3205:211b-11: par 'gyur ro // sgrol ma dkar mo'i sgrub thabs so //
